name: Lift Off (itch)
description:
Lift Off is a project developed by Cayleb Lucas and Alex T Batty for the Ludum Dare 38 jam.

Lift Off is a prototype for the "A Small World" theme. Its a casual, RPG game where the objective is to build a rocket to leave a wasteland planet.

MUST Do

Please visit the info page and the controls page so you know how to play and what to do.

GAME FEATURES

  • Crafting systems
  • Mining systems
  • AI combat system
  • Small world gravity
  • Amazing User Interface
  • Awesome Particle Effects

Follow the developers on Twitter!

@CaylebLucas + @Alex_theDev
